inclusion.criterion: Diarrhea more than 3 time per day after admitted in hospital more than 72 hours
inclusion.label: met

exclusion.criterion: patient on chemotherapy with neutropenia ,ANC less than 1,000/mm3
exclusion.label: unknown

exclusion.criterion: patients whose definite diagnosis cannot be obtained
exclusion.label: not_met

notes: The patient is a 60-year-old woman admitted to the stroke department with a recent history of a second course of intravenous antibiotics for aspiration pneumonia. She is febrile and complained of abdominal pain and diarrhea (bowel movements eight times in 3 hours, large volumes of greenish, liquid stool each time).
